what.title: What Do We Develop?
what.subtitle: Comprehensive custom software solutions with cutting-edge technologies

items.title: TailScript-based Web Applications
items.description: Fast, modern and efficient web systems with TailScript technology. Scalable solutions for complex business processes that work smoothly in every browser.

items.title: React Enterprise Applications
items.description: Enterprise-level web applications with React and Next.js. Intuitive user interface, fast loading, SEO-optimized structure â€“ everything needed for modern business applications.

items.title: Windows Desktop Software
items.description: Native Windows application development with .NET and modern C# technologies. Fast, reliable desktop solutions that integrate seamlessly into corporate environments.

items.title: Mobile App Development â€“ Android + iOS
items.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications with React Native and Flutter. One codebase, two platforms â€“ rapid development, excellent user experience on both operating systems.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose SIRONIC for Custom Development?

reasons.description: We're not just programmers â€“ we understand business processes. Every development is tailored to your needs to create real value.

reasons.title: Scalability

process.title: How Do We Work?
process.subtitle: Transparent, structured development process â€“ step by step

steps.title: Requirements Analysis and Consultation
steps.description: We learn about your business goals, expectations and current systems. We clarify exactly what you want to achieve with the software.

steps.title: UX/UI Design and Structure Building
steps.description: We design the user experience and interface. Wireframes, designs and interaction plans â€“ so we know exactly what we're building.

steps.title: Development and Continuous Coordination
steps.description: The actual coding. We communicate continuously, show progress, and respond to your needs â€“ so there are no surprises at delivery.

steps.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
steps.description: Thorough testing on every device and browser. Performance, security and functionality tests â€“ to ensure everything works flawlessly.

steps.title: Live Launch and Training
steps.description: Software deployment and user training. You get all documentation and support for smooth operation.

steps.title: Maintenance and Further Development
steps.description: Ongoing support, bug fixes and further development. The software always stays up-to-date and keeps pace with your needs.

examples: CRM and customer management systems â€“ keep your clients under control

Mobile applications â€“ in the hands of customers and employees

pricing.title: How Much Does a Custom Application Cost?
pricing.subtitle: Every project is unique â€“ pricing is always based on requirements
pricing.description: The price of custom application development depends on project complexity, functionality and time requirements. Small applications start from â‚¬2,000, larger enterprise systems can cost tens of thousands â€“ but we always prepare a custom quote.
pricing.process: In a free consultation, we assess your needs, discuss possibilities, and provide a transparent, fixed quote for the entire project.

items.question: How long does custom application development take?
items.answer: It depends on project size â€“ a simpler web application takes 4-8 weeks, while a complex enterprise system can take 3-6 months. We always agree on deadlines in the quote.

items.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
items.answer: Yes! We regularly integrate with ERPs, CRMs, invoicing systems and other external APIs. This is one of the biggest advantages of custom development.

items.question: Who owns the source code?
items.answer: After the project, the source code becomes your complete property â€“ no hidden license fees or dependencies.

items.question: What about maintenance and further development?
items.answer: We provide support after delivery: bug fixes, updates, further development â€“ with optional monthly or one-time solutions.

items.question: What warranty do we get on the application?
items.answer: There's a 6-month warranty on bugs after delivery â€“ we fix all functional problems free of charge during this period.

finalCta.title: Ready for a Custom Software Solution?
finalCta.description: Let's discuss your needs and create an application together that truly increases your business efficiency.
